A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So many things were bad about this movie. Plot holes and inappropriate humor at bad times. Acting was good and special effects were great. Just a bad story. My least favorite Star Wars movie by far... to each their own I can see why people like it. My straight forward opinion is the movie has no balls.. Can somebody just have an agenda and want something. I felt nothing for any character what so ever. I hope jj Abrams can fix this.
